alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 2:24PM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. between 2 and 5 inches, with 4 to 8 inches across Grade and Bench areas. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph over Whitebird Hill and in the Camas Prairie. * WHERE...Greer Grade, Grangeville and vicinity, and Camas Prairie. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible due to blowing and drifting snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
